item.description:
Have you thought about running a virtual event, but aren't sure how to get started? Do you have a book, workshop or series that you would like to expand to a global market? Join Kari Henley for a preview of her industry tutorial on the cutting edge technologies available, as well as time tested techniques to guarantee engagement and interaction from the audience.

The entire industry is changing right now, in some really wonderful ways. The old days of setting up a hotel to do workshops and expos are expensive, tiring and rarely profitable, and the traditional slide shows and podcasts are boring!  Kari will reveal tricks and tips to blend the old world with the new and get you started with a bang!

About our Speaker

The speaker for this meeting is our own

Kari Henley 

 

Kari is a the president of Gather Central, a weekly columnist with the Huffington Post, professional speaker, and an instructional design expert. Her greatest passions are in developing community, creating authentic connections, inspiring others to follow their passions, and remembering the power of the sacred. She has led workshops, retreats and keynotes for over 17 years. She has become an leader in translating interactive training programs into a vibrant virtual experience.
item.why: The speaker for this meeting is our own Kari Henley, fresh from her wildly successful stint as host of the 100 Women of Destiny teleconferences.
item.name: Come to April AWBL--7 Secrets to a Successful Virtual Event
